article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11g2SrY hentry entry story-marquee-standard

h2.a: Are These Lines The Same Height? Your Answer Depends On Where You're From

div.p: The history of the answer to this optical illusion is weird, but not for the reason you think it is.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZLKWUZ hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: We Have Six New Amazing Paintings By George W. Bush

div.p: Someone get this man a gallery exhibit.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Y5g6e9 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Jittery Spaniards Seek Safety In Bitcoins

div.p: Since Sunday, a trio of Bitcoin apps have soared up Spain’s download charts, coinciding with news that cash-strapped Cyprus was planning to raid domestic savings accounts to pay off a $13 billion bailout tab.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10fFJXu hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Never Lose Your Photos – Or Videos – Again

div.p: Remember how Picturelife makes backing up and showing all your photos as easy as taking them? Yeah, well now they're doing the same with video, no matter the file size. If you haven't given them a shot, here's your chance.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11gdt6e hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Click, Print, Shoot

div.p: Cody R. Wilson may not be 3D printing bongs and grinders, but his reimagining of arms manufacturing poses an equally, if not more disruptive blow to social interactions on both the so-called Dark Web and in flesh-and-blood.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11dODE5 hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: WE'RE NOT IN KANSAS CITY ANYMORE

h2.a: First Major Google Fiber Expansion Announced, Several More Planned

div.p: Olathe, Kansas has a modest population of about 128,000. But while it will only be the third city to get the Google Fiber treatment (the first not named Kansas City), it sets an important precedent: Google is serious about expanding its service.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10fbDU3 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Three Wars That Will Define America's Future

div.p: The wars of the 21st century will be dominated by three overlapping types of conflict: Wars of Silicon, Wars of Iron, and Wars in the Shadows.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZLWMOS hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Four Minutes Of Ninja Action From The New 'G.I. Joe' Movie Have Leaked

div.p: An extended clip of "G.I. Joe: Retaliation" has leaked. Best of all, it's a fight scene.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-1390ckW hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Congress Given Hilarious Options For Asteroid Defense

div.p: Congress got the word from NASA on Tuesday about its options for dealing with the threats posed by asteroids and comets: Lawmakers can either provide adequate funding for detecting and characterizing near-Earth objects, and diverting them if necessary — or they can pray.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-100Ou5q hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Former Dancer Claims Bolshoi Ballet Is 'A Giant Brothel'

div.p: Scandal is deepening around Moscow’s Bolshoi Ballet after a former soloist claimed female dancers were pimped to wealthy patrons by the theatre’s general director.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZdOOeY hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: How Coding Contests Can Be Better At Solving Problems Than Harvard

div.p: Harvard recently threw a tough genomics problem to TopCoder’s crowdsourced community and discovered the contest not only revealed a much broader field of investigation but provided a high level of motivation to get the problem solved.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WEcWLg hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Bizarre History Of Insect Head Transplants

div.p: Head transplants sound the most crazy futuristic scenario imaginable. Right? But not to entomologists. They’ve been transplanting the head of one insect onto another for 90 years -- while keeping both insects alive.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-yGUyXS hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Beer Madness

div.p: The Post's seventh annual beer tourney, built on a March Madness-like basketball bracket, pits 32 regional brews in head-to-head matchups based on styles.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-147OGFy hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Sugar, Not Fat, Exposed As Deadly Villain In Obesity Epidemic

div.p: It's addictive and toxic, like a drug, and we need to wean ourselves off it, says US doctor.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-100rJ1v hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: This Accidental Aaron Swartz Hoax Almost Cancelled Class At MIT Today

div.p: It started out as such a friendly joke: A couple of MIT sophomores sent a fake email around the university dormitories late last night, posing as the school's president and announcing classes were cancelled Wednesday because of threats related to the Aaron Swartz case. But this is the Aaron Swartz case, where nothing is friendly and everyone takes sides.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11h4i9f hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Obama To Take Away The CIA's Drones

div.p: The White House is poised to sign off on a plan to shift the CIA's lethal targeting program to the Defense Department.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15qRM3I hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Trying To Make Sense Of The Most Insane Conspiracy Theories About Hollywood, TV And The Illuminati

div.p: This is just good, old-fashioned fun.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WI9EI6 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: World’s Most Indestructible Limo Breaks Down, Again

div.p: In an incident symbolic of America's decline, President Obama's limo — nicknamed the Beast because of its supposed indestructibility — broke down in Jerusalem earlier today after some very smart person (an American, according to an Israeli news station) mistakenly filled it up with regular gasoline instead of diesel.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-160DNUt hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: To Save A Life, A Tug Of War With The Earth

div.p: When a construction worker lost his footing as he made his way through a tunnel near 95th street, the ground seemed to swallow him up, creating an extraordinary rescue challenge the likes of which the Fire Department has rarely faced.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14cBy2s hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Svedka Pulls The Plug On Its Sexy Robot

div.p: After fronting the brand's advertising for years, the curvaceous and polarizing metallic mascot will be relegated to the sidelines for a campaign debuting this spring that takes a more product-focused approach touting new flavors like orange cream pop.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YGxIXa hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: How The Military Is Controlling Online Speech — By Embracing It

div.p: Soldiers are legally prohibited from speaking out against the military. But an official site encourages them to do just that.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16JLXSF hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: BEST NOTEBOOK FOR TAKING IPO NOTES IN

h2.a: Everything You Need To Know About Moleskine Ahead Of Its IPO

div.p: Moleskine, the beloved Milan-based maker of cardboard-bound notebooks meant to evoke an earlier era of the Parisian arts scene, is going forward with its IPO. Here's what you should know.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Yn6Ig3 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Reinventing The Condom

div.p: The fact that such a modest device, nothing more than an inert sheath of latex, is one of the most effective tools in our armamentarium against HIV infection, and additionally prevents unintended pregnancy, is frankly astounding.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Y5JUHr hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Apollo Engines Have Been Recovered From The Bottom Of The Atlantic

div.p: A space history project led by Amazon.com founder Jeff Bezos has exciting news out today. Apollo mission F-1 enginges have been recovered from deep beneath the surface of the Atlantic ocean.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10hfEHJ hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Psychology Of Effective Workout Music

div.p: For some athletes and for many people who run, jog, cycle, lift weights and otherwise exercise, music is not superfluous — it is essential to peak performance and a satisfying workout.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16Jed7U hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Hilarious Notes On Modern Classics From Clueless Studio Executives

div.p: The image of non-creative types mucking about with (and screwing up) movies and television shows is nothing new — we’ve seen it in everything from Barton Fink to The Player to The Larry Sanders Show. Here are a few real life examples.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14ckY2x hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Why Is One Of The Most Popular Nude Beaches In The U.S. Getting Shut Down?

div.p: After too much bad behavior, nudists are stripped of the right to visit the beach on weekdays.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10ieVpR hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The NRA Wins Again

div.p: After Sandy Hook, after twenty children were shot and killed at a place where they should have been safe from all harm, there was some optimism among supporters of gun control. It was a futile hope.
